scripts.build: ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true npx eleventy & NODE_ENV=production npx tailwindcss -i src/styles/tailwind.css -c src/styles/tailwind.config.js -o _site/style.css --minify
scripts.serve: npx eleventy --serve & npx tailwindcss -i src/styles/tailwind.css -c src/styles/tailwind.config.js -o _site/style.css --watch
